Habit

             double value,

             boolean down)
Create a new Habit based on all the information needed

Parameters:
id - the id of the habit
notes - the notes associated to a habit
priority - the priority of the habit
text - the text of the habit
value - the value (points) of the habit
up - whether or not the habit can be "upped"
down - whether or not the habit can be "downed"
